In three sentences
Comments
Campus security monitors the school 24 hours. There is alot of security guards on campus to make feel safe. There all friendly.
The social clubs make you feel welcome and at home. Your chance to meet new and different types of people. you do fun activities.
An unusual traditions is to get on the school mascot and ride it and have your picture taken. Another unusual tradition is to learn to make the chaparrel bird noise.
You can go to sport games. They always have fun activities on campus that you can attend. Join a club and socialize with them.
You have a variety to choose from. Everyday there something new and food from different cultures. the food taste good and is fresh.
The students are very friendly. They have fun activities in the dorm for you to meet new people. Your resident assistant will be there to check on you and become your friend.

As long as you apply yourself to your academic goals getting high grades will be easy. Take execellent notes and always pay attention adn test will be easy. Ask questions if you don't understand something.
Be outgoing and i promise you wont regret it. Get to know your teachers because they there to help you and are willing to. try the activities on campus as a way to meet new people.
It has a nice size school. The teachers care about you and want to help you succeed. Nice size classroom's so learning is easy.

That's my only impression so far, but not bad., 191554=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 71722=everyone here is friendly, and it is easy to make new friends because the campus is somewhat small. it snows occasionally here and the weather is very moody. it changes from day to day. also the class sizes are small, teacher to student ratio 1:25 so you can get one on one with your teacher any time., 188321=The class ratio is 13:1, there is individual attention from professors and help to make sure you succeed. Do your work and you will succeed!}

textAfterTable: Am enjoying being here All of the people here are amazing. This does not just have christian in it's title we have it in our actions. I feel so at home and so in love with all of my teachers and all of the wonderful friends I have made here. Am learning a lot All of my professors are very knowledgeable and they want to share that with all of us. It is not just about the money to them. They sincerely care about our education.
